root.name: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects
root.description: GameplayMarvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects is a third person fighter from a partnership between EA and Marvel. The gameplay is simplified so the user/player is able to get a better feel for the character and his/her environment. All the playable characters have their unique abilities and special powers that help them to win matches. Most of the gameplay involves fighting and beating down your enemy. Playable Characters:Marvel Characters: Spider-Man The Thing Wolverine Daredevil (only found on consoles and DS version) Eddie Brock (Venom) Iron Man Captain America (only found on PSP version) Magneto Elektra Storm Human Torch Dr. Doom (only found on PSP version) Imperfect Characters:Niles Van Roekel Paragon Johny Ohm Brigade Solara The Wink Fault Zone Hazmat

similar_games.game: Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems
